title: Adventureous place with Holy & asthetic value
review: Steep Steps to reach temple or to go by Ropeway a good and adventureous place with Holy & asthetic value

title: Great...
review: A great place to visit when you are in Pushkar. We take ropeway to went there. Such a beautiful view of city from there. It is most famous temple in Pushkar.

title: The most beautiful temple !
review: This is the most beautiful temple of the city . Situated atop the hill and steep rope takes you there it gives you the best view of the city . The deity here is the concert of lord Brahma Savitri . This temple is unique there are not many temples of Savitri in the country !The rope cable car will cost you about RS 100/- it is a place if you like a great view of the city . Generally not crowded .A must visite place .

title: Cable Car was the main attraction
review: We were aware of the temple because of the cable car attraction. The cost of the two way ticket is Rs 97 + taxes for adults. One can also trek up through stairs. While in the cable car, it stops for 30 seconds mid way so that you can enjoy the view. The temple is still under construction. When you reach the temple, a group of monkey family will welcome you. They look harmless unless they see any eatable stuff in your hand. The last cable car trip is at 7.30PM. The best time to visit the temple is in the evening.

title: Most Renowned
review: I went to Savitri Temple. Savitri Temple is one of the most renowned and sanctified spots. The spiritual significance of the temple attracts huge number of devotees from all parts of the world, despite the fact that the temple is on a hill top. It is great place to go.

title: Temple in Mountain
review: Savitri Temple is Situated at Ratnagiri Mountain.

title: Beautiful view from the Savitri temple.
review: It is a must visit place the Temple of Savitri. Your visit of Pushkar is incomplete if this temple is not visited. Fantastic view from the top of the temple it is so enjoayble and fanrastic.

title: Hill Top Temple dedicated to the Consort of Brahma who created of the Universe
review: The temple is approached by steep step as well as a rope way. In fact the rope way is the main source of attraction now for the youngsters. You get nice view from the hill of the Pushakar surroundings.

title: For Pushkar's bird eye view
review: It is old temple which is now connected with Ropeway. One can see miles and miles of Pushkar and surrounding area.

title: Pushkar View from Top Savitri Temple
review: Worth visiting Savatri Temple- through Ropeway- Approz fare 120/- bugs to & fro or can use stairways . Gives scenic view of Pushkar from the top.

title: Temple on a hill top
review: This temple is on a hill top, which quite steep. One can reach by steps or by rope way. The Devi is supposed to be the first wife of Lord Bramha and came atop this temple in anger when the Lord married His second wife Gayatri Devi.

title: Savitri Temple-Puskar
review: Visited the temple on 23/02/2017 day time after 3 P.M as it closes after 1.30 P.M to 3.00 P.M,it is near Brahma Temple

title: Wonderful Temple
review: Built with marble,the temple has been embellished with silver coins.The temple also contains a sliver turtle on it's floor.There are a number of marble steps leading to an entrance gate of the temple.

title: Nice spot to get view of pushkar city.
review: Beautiful spot for the temple. Devotees can use the ropeway or stairs to reach the temple. Really calm and soothing spot

title: You will enjoy..do visit
review: The best part about this place is that it is located at such a place from where you can catch a glimpse of entire pushkar. There is a ropeway to take you from the starting point till the temple ...where you can enjoy the beautiful sight of the city. The temple is located at height calm and serene. Do visit this temple during your trip to Pushkar.

title: Savitri temple
review: Savitri temple is beautiful temple of Ajmer. wonderful building must see this.savitri temple is popular temple of Ajmer

title: Savitri Temple
review: Savitri TempleTemple of Ajmer is one of the best temple of Ajmer.this temple is beautiful. Good place for family.

title: visit to Ajmer and Pushkar
review: Savitri temple is one of the major attraction of Pushkar city and very popular among tourist as well as locals.Now it is easy to go to the temple without stairs also .A must visit place

title: Quaint temple to Savitri, Lord Brahma's consort
review: The approach road may be crowded, but, it is worth the visit, even if to see the fervour of devotees

title: Good in times when there is fog or mist
review: Need a ropeway to go there. From Pushkar u can see the hill. Ropeway cost 70/ adult and charge for kids too, credit card is accepted. Top of the hill there si a small temple, But the beauty gets enhanced if there is mist. Not sure how much we can enjoy if it is sunny.

title: Adventerous trip...Ropeway facility started
review: This is world famous temple of Savitri Mata, located on the Hill Top.

title: trip
review: it is very good temple and it is located in pushkar.you never miss this if you go to ajmer.it is near to ajmer

title: an devotee place with hiking include
review: its a temple of god Bramha's wife Savitri situated on top of a mountain, to reach reach its so high to climb but its worthy for hiking lover and sprictual people too the feel you geet after reach there is amazing

title: Good Ropeway ride
review: There is a ropeway to go to this temple which started about 4 months back. The charges per person is around Rs 90 to & fro. We went in Sep 2016. The temple is not crowded. The ride was sweet.& simple. As there is not much to see in Puskar, you can consider visiting this temple.

title: The view!! Didn't actually go in  temple..
review: It was quite a hike, and we went fairly fast to catch the sunset - could have taken the cable car but we needed the exercise!! Really really worth the view! Beautiful sunset. Didn't actually go into the temple.

title: Great view from there!
review: Took the ropeway to reach there...apart from the temple the top offers a great view of all around Pushkar..and has a small canteen too...must spend some time to soak in the beauty. Good pics from there..

title: Wife of 'bramha'
review: We went to  pushkar by uber from ajmer city. First we visited the savitri temple. Now ropeway is there . so anyone can go easily. From 12 to 2pm the temple is closed. You can get a nice view of the whole pushkar city from that hill top. The temple is newly made. Devi savitri 's deity is there inside the temple. The mythological story about 'devi' is very interesting. The expansion of temple complex is still going on.

title: One the rarest savitri temple
review: It's one of the rarest savitri temple in india which is situated in PUSHKAR which is around 15 km from ajmer city.

title: Cable Car Ride to Savitri Devi Temple
review: Must visit temple when u visit Pushkar. Have a great Cable Car ride, Have amazing views of pushkar, Get blessings from Mataji.

title: Amazing Soulful Experience
review: Amazing soulful experience, you hear so much about this place that you are super excited to be there

title: Trek to hill top temple
review: 3 to 4 kms from Bramha temple and therafter a 30 minute hard climb to the top. was tiring and after a 15 minute sojourn in company of gods  and a return 25 min trek to downhill. Winch is under construction may be ready in 6 months time

title: The only temple of Lord Brahma
review: Surely to visit if in Pushkar

title: "Peaceful place"
review: The temple is dedicated to Goddess Savitri, first wife of Lord Brahma.very peaceful temple,crowded some times.

title: Holy place to visit.
review: Very nice place to visit, entry free of cost, the crowd is average but not disciplined was irritating apart from that nice place to visit. like this place very much

title: Savitiri Temple visit through rope way
review: Visit to temple through rope way itself is an awesome experience. Tickets easily available & not costly too.

title: Holy place of Bhramha
review: Pushkar is the holy place with the only Bhamhaji temple and holy Pushkar lake. Best time to visit is during the month of Kartik ( Purnima ) during Pushkar fair.

title: Excellent TEmple
review: Temple dedicated to Godess Savitri is one important place to worship and spend few hours. Good place to visit.

title: Exquisite sunset
review: Recommended to see Exquisite sunset.well worth the 30 min climb.an excelant view of the desert pleasing to the soul and body.

title: Must visit if you can.
review: It's a very holy place, but what's more beautiful is the view of the entire place from the top of the Hill. The temple is located on the top of the Hill which is about 750 steps from the foot of the hill.

title: visit here for the amazing ropeway journey
review: you need to take the ropeway trolley to this hilltop temple. which gives you great views of pushkar.

title: Great view
review: It was a steep climb but the view was definitely worth it. The temple itself was not extraordinary besides its location.

title: Savitri Temple ancient temple
review: I had an opportunity to go up to this temple which is on the top of hill in Puskar, one has to climb few hundred steps to reach the temple, it is quite an effort to climb the temple from the top of the hill this temple of goddess Savitri is nice place to visit very few devotees visit this temple as it takes at least half an hour to reach the temple and that too after taking breaks every few minutes or else you can not climb up, the areal view from the top from the temple is so beautiful that one can not imagine you can see the entire Pushkar lake and the entire city of Pushkar.

title: Beautiful Maa Saraswati on Ratnagiri hill
review: The temple is situated on top of the Ratnagiri hill which is the highest point in Pushkar. Here Maa Saraswati is with her mother. The mythology goes that Lord Brahma for performing a Yagnya in Pushkar has taken Maa Gayatri as his wife as Maa Saraswati got delayed in her shringar. So, Maa Saraswati cursed Lord Brahma will not have any other temple of worship other than Pushkar and went to her mother's place on top of this hill and stayed with her. It's a very small temple, seems renovated recently. During renovation, the antiquity of the temple is not protected I felt.

title: A Nice Temple
review: Savitri Temple is located on the hill behind Brahma Temple. The temple is dedicated to Goddess Savitri, first wife of Lord Brahma. We have to climb series of steps for atleast  one hour to get blessing of Goddess Savitri on top. From here one gets an ariel view of surrounding nature. A nice visit.

title: excellent
review: i visited this temple on 11-2-15 by 7.00am.return to down by 10.30am.it will take 3.30hrs to up and down the hill.the steps are too hard and steep.we will face monkeys on the way to goddess monkeys do nothing to piligrams.going going to reach the temple on the top of the hill.i got leg strains for 2 days but the believe of the goddess i forgotten allthe hard climbing to the hill.overall it is a excellent place to visit.the renovation recently done the temple.

title: Hard luck
review: You get to see the best views of Pushkar Town from here but we could not complete the climb as the last stretch of the track was quite tacky.I would recommend it only if you are staying in Pushkar and are early risers.
